name: episode
short_description: Episode is a quasi-acronym for Extended Packaging and Install SOftware DEpot. A replacement for rpm/apt/yum for enterprises, that allows system operators to create, install, and update, on either a system or user account.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License

Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Quality Engineers
